description:

[color=white] Here’s a little gift for you. You can earn some more credits with it, boost your crew’s skills and perks, and just have some fun playing a new vehicle.

[h3] Choose one of following three Tier V rental vehicles to have for 3 days: [/h3]
[list][*]Tier V Premium German Pz.Kpfw. T 25 medium tank
[*]Tier V Premium American M4 Improved medium tank
[*]Tier V Premium Soviet Churchill III heavy tank [/list]

If you already have all these vehicles, you will get 5 missions for x5 XP (these can be applied after battle).

[h3]To receive the item, [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1407200/?utm_source=inventory_retention3][u]click here[/u][/url] and log in to the game. Good luck and see you on the battlefield![/h3]
